Content copied to clipboard

Parameters

autoReconnectOnUnexpectedDisconnect

If set to true, Terminal will try to reconnect to your reader.

bluetoothReaderReconnectionListener

You will need to set bluetoothReaderReconnectionListener and being notified by BluetoothReaderReconnectionListener.onReaderReconnectStarted when reconnection starts. You will need to listen to BluetoothReaderReconnectionListener.onReaderReconnectSucceeded for succeeded reconnection, BluetoothReaderReconnectionListener.onReaderReconnectFailed for failed reconnection
